Interaktivně prozkoumejte a srovnejte di: Interactively explore and compare dispositions of famous pipe organs or create your own dispositions.
Uložte si k dispozicím registrace konkré: Save registrations of pieces you play for each disposition.
Vše sdílejte se svými kolegy a dalšími z: Share everything with you colleagues and friends.
<strong>Varhanní dispozice</strong> je s: Organ disposition is a summary of sound and technical characteristics of organ.
Kromě seznamu rejstříků a&nbsp;pomocných: Apart from the list of stops and auxiliary devices it also covers basic technical description of the organ.
Pro správné vytištění zrušte nastavení t: For correct printing results please set page margins to 0.
<strong>Rejstřík</strong> je sada píšťal: Stop is a group of pipes sharing the same sound character.
Polohu (výšku tónů) rejstříku určuje sto: Tone pitch of the stop is specified by foot numbers: 8' means base pitch, lower number (e.g. 4') means higher pitch, higher number (e.g. 16') means lower pitch.
Rejstříky dělíme do kategorií podle způs: Several construction categories of stops can be distinguished.
Pro každý <strong>manuál</strong> (klavi: Organ has separate set of stops for each manual (keyboard).
Vítejte ve světě varhan!:
Welcome to the world
of pipe organs!
Organomania vám atraktivním způsobem pře: Organomania will attractively present pipe organs in Czech Republic - as a part of our cultural heritage, as a technical device and as a living musical instrument.
Prozkoumejte nejvýznamnější a&nbsp;nejvz: Explore the most famous and valuable instruments in Czech Republic.
Zjistěte více o&nbsp;jejich historii a&n: Learn about their history and sound character.
Seznamte se se staviteli varhan, ať už j: Learn about organ builders - meet ancient organ builder families as well as contemporary organ builder workshops and factories.
Objevte prestižní hudební festivaly zamě: Explore prestigeous music events focused on concerts of organ music. Learn about future organ interpretation competitions.
Stránky jsou určeny pro aktivní varhaník: Website is designed for active organists,
studenty hudebních škol i pro širokou ve: students of music schools and for general public.
Záměrem je poskytnout rámcový přehled, n: Website provides general overview, not complete register of pipe organs.
Porovnejte rejstříky obsažené v dispozic: Compare stops in dispositions of selected pipe organs. Discover changes that were made in dispositions after organ rebuilds.
Prozkoumejte a srovnejte dispozice známý: Explore and compare dispositions of famous pipe organs or create your own. Learn about particular organ stops and save registrations of organ pieces.
Prozkoumejte názvy, typy a zvukovou char: Explore names, types and sound character of organ stops. See organ dispositions in which they are contained.
Prohlédněte si připravované i proběhlé v: Explore future and past organ competitions in Czech Republic. Learn about number of rounds, participation fees and prizes for winners.
Objevte prestižní hudební festivaly a ko: Find prestigeous musical events and concerts of classical music in Czech Republic. Visit organ recitals as well as vocal-instrumental concerts featuring top performers.
Prohlédněte si historické i soudobé varh: Explore historical and present organ builder workshops of Czech Republic. Learn about their artistic style (Baroque, Romantic organ building) and about famous pipe organs they built.
Prohlédněte si nejvýznamnější varhany v: Explore the most famous pipe organs in Czech Republic. Learn about their sound character, find their organ builder, see list of organ stops (the disposition).
Pro více informací klikněte na tlačítko: Click on the View button to display details.
Registrace představuje <strong>seznam va: Registration is a list of organ stops, which are turned on for particular piece of music.
Volba rejstříků určuje výslednou sílu a: The choice of organ stops affects the resulting sound power and color.
Uspořádejte si uložené registrace do sad: Arrange your saved registrations into sets intended for specific event. You can then easily switch between displayed registrations or you can share them to other people (e.g. to visitors of your concert).
